conversations.body_text: Hi Chris Dela Cruz,    We apologize for the inconvenience and kindly request you to provide the outer packaging information for the pedal, specifically the small label displaying the product model. Thank you for your cooperation. We will issue a $20 refund as compensation. We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience caused.

Hello,

Unfortunately $20 Would not be enough for me to Keep the silver color and
it was not one of the options I provided. I would like black pedals as I
had ordered. You can either choose option one or option two from the email
that I sent. $20 is not sufficient for me to keep the silver pedals. See
the attached picture.

Best Regards,
Chris Dela Cruz


On Mon, Nov 24, 2025 at 9:57 PM service@simsonn.com
Hi Chris Dela Cruz,    Please provide another image of the shipping label. If they are on the same side, it would be best if both labels appear together.

Best Regards,
Chris Dela Cruz


On Mon, Nov 24, 2025 at 11:01 PM service@simsonn.com

Hello

I have sent the requested pictures. What is the next step? Do you want me
to send the pedals back or Are you able to provide a refund of $73.70.



Best Regards,
Chris Dela Cruz

Hello

I have not heard back from you guys. I will have to claim a dispute with my
credit card company if there is no resolution as the product that I ordered
was not received and was provided an incorrect product. As I said
previously, I can ship the silver ones back to you and you can ship me the
black ones or provide the refund amount that I requested.
Hi Chris Dela Cruz,    We apologize for the inconvenience caused. You have already applied a $45 discount, and we can refund up to $30 as compensation. Thank you for your understanding.

Hello

Ok please refund me $30. Thank you.

Best Regards,
Chris Dela Cruz

I have not heard a response or seen a credit of $30 to my account. Can you
please provide an update?

Hi Chris Dela Cruz,    We sincerely apologize for the delay in processing your request. Our customer service team has been exceptionally busy recently. As compensation, we will issue a refund of $45. Please cancel your chargeback, as we are unable to process refunds while the chargeback is active. We apologize for any inconvenience caused!

Hello

Please follow Chase's procedure. According to Chase, you are able to give
me the refund on your end. I will not cancel the chargeback unless I have
proof that a refund was initiated. I cannot file a second chargeback if I
cancel the original, meaning if you do not refund me, then I have lost all
leverage.

Chris

Hi Chris Dela Cruz,    Hello, please cancel your chargeback as soon as possible so we can process your refund.

Hi

As I stated in my email, I will only cancel the charge back once I see the
refund. Chase has informed me that you can initiate a refund without me

Chris
